summary: This mod adds Geralt as follower
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Geralt of Rivia as follower.

Requires:
-ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_1

Replaces:
-Blind Eyes with The Witcher Eyes

Installation:
Just copy to Skyrim/Data
Type in console:
help geralt
player.placeatme [id]

Know Issues:
He always wants payment for killing monsters...

This is my first mod, so I expect there might be problems or bugs, or things might break. I\'ll do my best to address problems, either send me a message or post in the forum comment area.
author: Seh3rim
